topic.title: ZeroSites about Culture, Literature, Philosophy, Art, Cinema, Science etc.
topic.body: Please post your site id here, if you write about related topics.

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body: I'm writing about Art & Philosophy (probably mostly in German). http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LvA9gq9HQWJS1uB8CahzgNm3UJxFi9snt/

2_16nZf7G4qaYRtFpHM9MM1A32nV5oqU9TW1.body:
Deleting sites is a painful action. You have to read the name of the site you want to delete, go to the dashboard, look for the name and press delete. 

Is it possible to have a delete button directly on every site? Something like the Follow in Newsfeed?
